params.description: params defines the transfer parameters to update. NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.title: Msg Update Params
MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

send_enabled.description: send_enabled enables or disables all cross-chain token transfers from this chain.

receive_enabled.description: receive_enabled enables or disables all cross-chain token transfers to this chain.

ibc.applications.transfer.v1.Params.title: Params
ibc.applications.transfer.v1.Params.description: Params defines the set of IBC transfer parameters. NOTE: To prevent a single token from being transferred, set the TransfersEnabled parameter to true and then set the bank module's SendEnabled parameter for the denomination to false.
